attributes.action: Cap child maintenance salary calculation in line with higher income tax
attributes.additional_details: Enforce child maintenance to use net income calculation. Current method increases income tax and child maintenance payment which essentially penalises any furthering in the employment field.
attributes.background: Assess the child maintenance calculation method to encourage non-residential parents to upskill or open or increase business without penalisation through using net income information, not gross income.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open, which you might like to sign:

Change child maintenance calculations from gross annual earnings to Net earnings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641721
